resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
What type of building is it?
Describe what you see. Answer questions such as: what is it?, what style is it?, why was it built? which religion is it associated with?, which languages are used? etc…
In what year was it built?
Which religion is it associated with?
What purpose does the point of interest have?
What purpose does it have?, answer questions such as: does it represent a historical event?, is there a service being offered? etc…
How much is the entrance fee?
Describe the feature. Answer questions such as: what is it?, what is it made out of?, what colors are used ? etc…
Welcome to "Crowdsourcing of Information on Points of Interest" experiment using Pikedia
This experiment is being conducted to gather information on buildings or objects that are of interest.The information that you give in the study will be handled confidentially.
Kindly, tap on the bottom arrow to start the experiment
Start tagging the photograph preview for the building\'s features such as doors, statue, etc by tapping on the screen
Bacon ipsum dolor amet alcatra meatloaf shankle porchetta pork chop boudin ham ham hock shank venison short ribs swine flank rump.
